messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] reading posts
messages.msgSnippet: Ren,  I like the way you think!   I just read your post .  ne ne ne ne, ne ne ne ne.   ( OK that s the twilight zone theme if anyone was wondering) I
messages.messageBody:
Ren, I like the way you think! <g> I just read your post . ne ne ne ne, ne ne ne ne. ( OK that's the twilight zone theme if anyone was wondering)

I probably need to read all my posts before I reply, but you know, then how would you guys get to know me?? <g>

Kelli
starsuncloud@... wrote:In a message dated 12/14/02 7:46:11 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Back to lurkdom now for me, too (with brief, enthusiastic
grinning, waving, hugs and kisses to everyone here!!!). >>

Hey Marji!! I was wondering where you were lately.

And welcome Pam, I think you'll like it here.

Ren
"Knowledge will not always take the place of simple observation."
~Arnold Lobel
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
